Please read these terms carefully before using Cuvio's AI meal planning services.

Last updated: January 16, 2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using Cuvio ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our AI meal planning application and related services provided by Cuvio ("we," "our," or "us").

2. Description of Service

Cuvio provides an AI-powered meal planning service that includes:

  • Personalized meal plan generation
  • Recipe recommendations and cooking instructions
  • Smart shopping list creation
  • Nutrition tracking and analysis
  • AI cooking assistant and tips
  • Seasonal ingredient optimization
  • Dietary preference accommodation

The Service is provided "as is" and we reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the Service at any time.

3. AI-Generated Content and Nutritional Information

Cuvio uses artificial intelligence to generate meal plans, recipes, and nutritional information. While we strive for accuracy, we cannot guarantee that all nutritional values, ingredients, or recommendations are complete, accurate, or suitable for your individual needs.

Your Responsibility: You are responsible for verifying any information provided before relying on it, including:

  • Checking nutritional labels and portion sizes
  • Verifying ingredients and allergen information
  • Confirming that meals meet your dietary restrictions and health requirements
  • Ensuring recipes are appropriate for your cooking skills and equipment

Medical Disclaimer: Cuvio does not provide medical, dietary, or nutrition advice, and the service should not be used as a substitute for professional consultation. Always seek the guidance of a qualified healthcare professional or registered dietitian regarding your diet and health, especially if you have:

  • Food allergies or intolerances
  • Chronic health conditions
  • Special dietary requirements
  • Pregnancy or breastfeeding considerations

To the fullest extent permitted by law, Cuvio accepts no liability for any loss, injury, or adverse outcome resulting from reliance on AI-generated content.

You must be at least 13 years old to create an account. Users under 18 must have parental consent.
